teacher_info.about_teacher:
I'm a patient type of a teacher. I always listen to my students and I always customize my lessons in order to meet the needs of my students. I think that the fact that I enjoy teaching can also be seen in my lessons. I always take time to think about the lesson plan in order to give the best to the student.

!!!Cancellation or rescheduling is possible only 24hrs (or more) before the lesson. After that, no rescheduling is accepted and the lesson will be considered as complete. No exceptions. Thank you.!!!
teacher_info.teaching_style:
My lessons are highly personalized. I offer grammar lessons as well as only conversations, but of course we can do both, depending on what exactly do you need. After each lesson, you will get feedback from me. I often also give homeworks, so you could think and practise at home. All materials used during the lesson is given to the student either before or after the lesson.

!!!Отмена или перенос занятий возможны только за 24 часа (или более) до начала урока. После этого изменение расписания не принимается, и урок будет считаться завершенным. Без исключений. Спасибо.!!!

teacher_info.intro:
Привет из России!
Меня зовут Диана, мне 23 года. Я живу в уютном городе с очень «русским названием» Иваново. Мои хобби – это написание писем, отправление открыток, просмотр мультфильмов и чтение книг. Ещё я обожаю слушать музыку и ездить на концерты. 

Hello from Russia! My name is Diana, I'm 23 years old. I live in a cozy town with a very "Russian name" Ivanovo. My hobbies are writing letters, sending postcards, watching cartoons and reading books. I also adore listening to music and going to concerts.
teacher_info.about_me:
Привет из России!
Меня зовут Диана, мне 23 года. Я живу в уютном городе с очень «русским названием» Иваново. Мои хобби – это написание писем, отправление открыток, просмотр мультфильмов и чтение книг. Ещё я обожаю слушать музыку и ездить на концерты. 

Hello from Russia! My name is Diana, I'm 23 years old. I live in a cozy town with a very "Russian name" Ivanovo. My hobbies are writing letters, sending postcards, watching cartoons and reading books. I also adore listening to music and going to concerts.
teacher_info.about_teacher:
В следующем году я стану профессиональным преподавателем русского языка как иностранного. Уже сейчас у меня достаточно знаний для обучения начинающих и подготовке к экзаменам. Мой опыт работы с иностранными студентами 5 лет. На наших уроках мы будем использовать английский как язык-посредник до уровня А2. 

Next year I will become a professional teacher of Russian as a foreign language. I already have enough knowledge to teach beginners and prepare for exams. My experience of working with foreign students is 5 years. In our lessons we will use English as an intermediary language up to A2 level.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
Мои уроки базируются на культуре России. Я даю учебный материал в правилах и схемах с примерами. Объём домашнего задания зависит от вашей занятости. С уровня А2 половина занятий будет посвящена говорению, чтению и произношению. Для студентов с уровнем В1 и выше я могу предложить беседы. Мы изучим лексику по интересующей вас теме. 

My lessons are based on Russian culture. I offer material in rules and diagrams with examples. The amount of home task depends on your busyness. From level A2, half of the lessons will be devoted to speaking, reading and pronunciation. For students with a B1 level and above, I can offer conversations. We will study vocabulary on a topic of interest to you.

course_info.trial_description:
Я и ученик знакомимся друг с другом. Я определяю уровень владения языком (несколько простых вопросов). Мы обсуждаем цели, наличие свободного времени, интересы и предпочитаемую форму занятий (серьёзный урок, игровое занятие, комбинация первых двух видов, упор на говорение/чтение/произношение и так далее) Я продемонстрирую учебники, типичную презентацию урока и расскажу о себе. 

The student and I get to know each other. I determine the level of language proficiency (a few simple questions). We discuss goals, availability of free time, interests and preferred form of study (serious lesson, play activity, a combination of the first two types, emphasis on speaking / reading / pronunciation, etc.) I will demonstrate the textbooks, a typical lesson presentation and tell about myself.

pro_course_detail.title: Русский язык (первые шаги) / Russian language (first steps)
pro_course_detail.description:
Курс для начинающих. Мы будем изучать русский алфавит, фонетику, чтение и письмо с самого начала. Основной учебник называется "Привет, Россия!", также я даю прописи и аутентичные тексты из школьной программы России. Во время урока будет демонстрироваться презентация, ученик может делать конспект. Наличие и объём домашнего задания зависит от ваших целей и занятости. 80% домашнего задания основано на культуре России (проза, стихи, мультфильмы, кино). Если Вы приобретаете курс, вы получаете презентацию каждого урока.  

A course for beginners. We will study Russian alphabet, phonetics, reading and writing from beginning. The main textbook is called "Hello, Russia!", I also give handwriting lists and authentic texts from the Russian school programme. During our lesson, a presentation will be demonstrated, you can take notes. The availability and amount of homework depends on your goals and busyness. 80% of homework is based on Russian culture (prose, poetry, cartoons, movies). If you purchase a course, you will receive a presentation of each lesson.

pro_course_detail.title: Беседа с носителем языка / Conversation with the native speaker
pro_course_detail.description:
До начала урока мы вместе с учеником выбираем тему беседы. В зависимости от целей и предпочтений студента, я готовлю игры с лексикой и/или словарь. И также читаю статьи по выбранной теме, чтобы быть интересным собеседником. 

Before the beginning of lesson, student and I choose the topic of conversation. Depending on the student's goals and preferences, I prepare vocabulary games and/or vocabulary glossary . And I also read articles on a chosen topic to be an interesting interlocutor .

pro_course_detail.title: Лингвострановедение России / Linguistic and Regional Studies of Russia
pro_course_detail.description:
Курс рассчитан на студентов с уровнем А2+, В1 и выше. Я предлагаю изучение культуры России через язык, искусство и традиции отдельных регионов страны. Вы узнаете, где находится Город невест, где готовят варенье из огурцов и какой город называют столицей закатов. Мы будем читать фрагменты книг, изучать рецепты блюд, слушать и петь песни, смотреть фильмы и отправлять открытки. 

The course is designed for students with level A2 +, B1 and above. I propose the study of Russian culture through the language, art and traditions of regions. You will find out where the City of Brides is located, where cucumber jam is made and which city is called the capital of sunsets. We will read fragments of books, study recipes, listen to and sing songs, watch movies and send postcards.

  In case you want to follow a textbook, I've purchased new textbooks recently (A1-B1), well-structured, with new content and learning techniques! This material is free for you!

I’ll apply up-to-date textbooks, films, news, magazines, blogs,videos etc.

1. If the student does not attend the lesson without more than 24 hours notice, the lesson will be confirmed as complete.
2. If the student is late, the lesson will still end on time and the student will be charged for the whole lesson.
3. Reschedule is possible with at least 24hrs of prior notice.
4. Please, note that 1hr session will last 55 minutes, 30 min session - 25 minutes. Thank you for understanding.

course_info.trial_description: In this lesson I will test your language level (Russian, Romanian or English) and will suggest an individual learning program/textbooks for you according to your level and needs. I will advice to what and how to pay more attention/learn in order to enhance  your the weaker parts of your target language skills. If you have any other idea to perform in our lessons, I am very open minded and able to adapt to your needs, so you are very welcome to utter them! See you soon! :)

pro_course_detail.title: General or Conversational Russian classes (2-3 lessons/week).
pro_course_detail.description:
1. Intensive course. Levels - A1-C1
!!! Choosing this package you are responsible for scheduling minimum 2-3 lessons PER WEEK.

I love meeting dedicated and motivated people who are excited about my native language. I prefer a systematic approach to learning: we can follow a textbook or I can develop a personalized course for you.
I provide well-structured lessons - a pdf file will be given to you before the lesson starts. 
 The lessons aim to take you to the next level, to develop your language skills intensively and faster (speaking, reading, grammar, writing and listening).
 I will use some reliable Russian textbooks, audio files with scripts and online resources - videos, authentic articles adapted to your level, books for online reading etc...
2. Conversational Russian (30 or 60 minutes) for those who already speak Russian and want to get fluent in speaking. You should be at least at A2+ - B1 level and higher.
- we'll have day to day conversations. It will allow you to expand your vocabulary and communicate comfortably.
- with error correction and grammar practice so that it will allow you to communicate accurately.

30 minutes package is for Conversational classes ONLY.

 Don't hesitate to book your trial lesson and let's discuss your goals, make your learning plan and put it into action! :D

teacher_info.intro: I’m a speech therapist and a Russian language teacher. I can help to improve your Russian pronunciation, speaking skills, grammar, reading and etc.
teacher_info.introduction:
Hi, my name is Svetlana, I’m a speech therapist and a Russian language teacher. I always try to make my classes both interesting and dynamic for students, and suitable to their level, goals and wishes. With conversational Russian as a basis we can work on your grammar, or if you like reading we will practice with some easy or advanced texts/books to go through and discuss. This can really help to improve your vocabulary and speaking skills. Don’t worry if you are only a beginner in Russian and its alphabet seems so difficult! By the first class you will be able to read Russian words with ease! 
As a speech therapist, I work a lot by fixing difficult Russian sounds and pronunciation, in order to help you sound clear and natural. I can also offer you: 
1. Help with Russian homework. 
2. Preparation for tests and exams. 
3. Proofreading.
I base my lessons on your requests, feel free to contact me if you have any questions!

pro_course_detail.title: General Russian (A1-C2) or Conversation practice (A2-C2)
pro_course_detail.description:
General Russian lesson (A1-C2) 
           These lessons are for beginners who have no or little previous knowledge of Russian and for intermediate, advanced level students who want to continue improving their knowledge of Russian grammar and listening, speaking and reading skills.
      For teaching I use a course which consists of grammar, grammar exercises and of interesting texts about most common topics and from russian literature, audio files of texts and dialogues, speaking exercises. 
      In the lessons we work with grammar exercises, read, translate stories and do speaking exercises. 
         You will progress quickly and explore the language in depth.

Conversation practice lesson (A2-C2)
        Are you on an intermediate or advanced level and would like to boost your communication skills? Then you will find the Russian conversation sessions very well suited to your purposes.
* I will strengthen your existing knowledge and build upon it. 
* You will quickly feel at ease in a real Russian conversation.
* You will learn Russian fast in a fun and entertaining way. 
       In these lessons we have conversatons about most common topics such as biography, appearance, character, family, study, home, homeland, free time, shopping or other topics such as science and discoveries, computer and internet, books and reading, cars and driving and so on, in which you can speak all lesson long. 
      You can choose your topic for conversation or I can give you a list of topics from which you can choose a topic before the lesson. 
      I correct the students mistakes in grammar, in pronunciation, in forming correct structure of sentence, in choosing right vocabulary and also give relative grammar explanations.

        The students along with study materials for the lesson receive from me also, according to their level in Russian, self study materials for reading, listening and watching, which help a lot with improving listening and understanding skills.

pro_course_detail.title: Reading in Russian and discussing (A2-C2)
pro_course_detail.description:
In these lessons I give the student to read texts according to his level in Russian (mostly interesting or funny stories) and we have discussions about these texts. I correct the students mistakes in grammar, in pronunciation, in forming correct structure of sentence, in choosing right vocabulary and also give relative grammar explanations.
      The students along with study materials for the lesson receive from me also, according to their level in Russian, self study materials for reading, listening and watching, which help a lot with improving reading, listening and understanding skills.

teacher_info.about_teacher:
When I was a student I studied languages (English, Spanish, Norwegian) and intercultural communications. Therefore, I can say that I clearly understand what challenges you may face while learning a language. 
I have been teaching English both children and teens since my second year in university. 
I believe, that it is extremely important not only to have relevant experience, but also to follow current developments. That is why, I try to introduce up-to-date material from the real world during my lessons.
I enjoy teaching elementary, intermediate and upper-intermediate students.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
I can help you to develop speaking, reading, listening and writing skills. Together we can improve your grammar and get ready for the IELTS exam. 
During my lessons I usually use different textbooks and articles, various videos and podcasts, presentations and other resources. I have some special exercises to develop both your accuracy and fluency. 
I prefer to act as a coach giving tips, how to study English on your own. That is why I usually give out hometasks that we will check at the beginning of each lesson.
I do my best to find a personal approach to each of my students. In return I am looking for highly motivated students who are ready to commit for achieving the goal.

In order to progress in a more effective way, I would suggest you to take classes 2-3 times a week.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
So, I suggest that we focus on 3 main issues: 
- grammar basis 
Grammar is the core of any language, without knowing grammar rules the whole studying process is useless. 
- prononciation 
There is nothing wrong with having an accent, on the contrary, an accent might add you a certain charm, but, nonetheless, people whom you communicate with should be able to understand you.
- Oral production (Speaking)
Speaking might be one of the most challenging things in the whole language study structure. The ability to communicate is the skill that has to be trained on a regular basis. Only practicing the language you will become fluent in the language you study.

My classes can be different, and it's always possible to discuss a topic you're interested in or we can do some exercises to train your grammar skills, or to expand your vocabulary, it's up to you!=)

I will be very glad to help you with learning Russian or English!
Important thing - I work only with adults.

course_info.trial_description:
We will discuss your needs and expectations from your language learning. 
I prepare learning material for each lesson, that's why we'll be able practice grammar, speaking or listening :)
Start or continue your language journey with me.
Will be happy to help you :)

pro_course_detail.title: One-on-One tutoring: English
pro_course_detail.description: I will help you to improve your pronunciation, grammar and reading skills. I use various articles, videos, audios and exercises to reach these goals. :)

pro_course_detail.title: One-on-One tutoring: Russian / Индивидуальное занятие по русскому языку
pro_course_detail.description:
I will help you to improve your grammar, reading and listening skills in Russian.  I use various books, videos, presentations for you to enjoy the process of learning.

Я с радостью помогу Вам улучшить грамматику, чтение и аудирование по русскому языку. Я использую различные книги, видео, презентации для того, чтобы Вы наслаждались процессом изучения языка.

pro_course_detail.title: Conversation in English
pro_course_detail.description:
We will practice speaking English naturally, and you'll have a unique opportunity to express yourself in English. I won't just correct your mistakes but also explain why and answer your questions.
I have lots of topics to discuss and I'm also open to my students' ideas :)

teacher_info.intro: Hello, my name is Liza, I am a native and certified Russian teacher. I was born in Moscow, so I have a classical Russian pronunciation. I live in Paris. Today I make my PhD in comparative literature at Université Sorbonne Nouvelle. I am fond of fine arts, theatre and languages. I have been teaching  Russian for more than 7 years.
teacher_info.short_signature: Sertified Russian teacher living in Paris, speaks French and English
teacher_info.about_me: Hello, my name is Liza, I am a native and certified Russian teacher. I was born in Moscow, so I have a classical Russian pronunciation. I live in Paris. Today I make my PhD in comparative literature at Université Sorbonne Nouvelle. I am fond of fine arts, theatre and languages. I have been teaching  Russian for more than 7 years.
teacher_info.about_teacher: My role as a teacher is to look for and to find the best way of learning for each of my students. I work with kids, teenagers and adults.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
I am very flexible. I have lots of materials, but I am open for any suggestions. Every program as well as every lesson are unique.
The most important in learning languages is friendly atmosphere, so to make the process psycologicaly comfortable and enjoyable.

edu_info.institution: РГГУ / Russian State University for the Humanities

course_info.trial_description: You are welcome to taste any lesson from my list. I would like to know in advance just your level, your aims and wishes.

pro_course_detail.title: General Russian [all levels]
pro_course_detail.description: This is a general academic course starting from your level. Speaking, listening, reading and writing. Vocabulary, grammar, phrases and cultural details - if you are interested - why do we speak so? It can be adapted up to your interests. All materials and exercises are provided free of charge.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian for kids [4-12] Tales, stories, pictures
pro_course_detail.description:
A course for children for all levels, bilinguals are also welcomed. 
Materials are provided. Sometimes it is better to buy special textbooks on your own.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian: from honest media to propaganda
pro_course_detail.description: The course is based on Russian contemporary media, either independent that are mostly blocked today in the country and that who work in the country under strict control. We will compare their languages, vocabulary and ideas analyzing the methods of propaganda.

pro_course_detail.title: Conversational practice
pro_course_detail.description:
Practice is build upon your preferences and interests. Pronunciation, listening and spontaneity.  Consulting about vocabulary, phrasing, spheres of use are on demand. 
Possible from the very beginning.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian fairy tales and short stories
pro_course_detail.description: Special course that opens language and culture through each other. It is based on Russian literature, history and traditions, that provide us explanation of the logic of the Russian mind and give an access to the past and contemporary Russian world. The course is based on a  methodology of teaching language as a part of another subject and is aimed to give a student a strong motivation in studying language by engaging him in studying and reopening fascinating and terrifying Russian culture.

teacher_info.intro:
Hello! Privet!

I was born in Moscow but currently I am travelling around the world working online. I love travelling (I've visited more than 30 countries!) and exploring this amazing world. I love movies that much that I always win at that 'film section' at a local quiz. I am also fond of music and enjoy singing and playing the piano. I think my love to the English language mostly came to me through foreign songs and movies. It was my greatest motivation to understand what my favourite actors said and singers sang.

На связи Ольга! Я родилась в Москве, но сейчас путешествую по миру. Люблю спорт, петь и играть на пианино. С радостью разделю с тобой свою любовь к языкам, особенно к моему :)
teacher_info.about_me:
Hello! Privet!

I love movies that much that I always win at that 'film section' at a local quiz. I am also fond of music and enjoy singing and playing the piano. teacher_info.about_teacher:
I have a degree in linguistics and have been teaching English for over 10 years. 
English has always been my passion and I enjoy sharing this love with my students. I think without genuine love or motivation and inspiration for something it is truly hard to achieve your goals. So I always do my best to show to my students that learning languages can be fun and that it is one of the best things you can do for yourself to enjoy travelling the world as much as possible.  

Я всегда стараюсь заинтересовать моих учеников и показать им, что изучение языка может быть увлекательным. Считаю, что изучение иностранного языка может стать лучшим вложением в жизнь каждого.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
In my lessons I do my best to make sure my students understood the rules and meanings of new words. It is not a problem to adapt to your personal needs - whether it is grammar, speaking practice or preparing for your exams. I am especially good at grammar because at the university we did study a lot about it so I will gladly explain the hardest grammatical topics to you. 

I've got my own set of activities and books that I've gathered during my teaching career - all waiting for you :)


На уроках мы можем поговорить на неформальные темы, и я расскажу тебе о столице России и русских обычаях. Обязательно выучим много новых крутых фразочек, и потренируем произношение.

exp_info.description: I worked as an HLTA at a primary private British school. I had my own groups of childrren for literacy and maths lessons and assisted special needs students at lessons.
I have been working as a private tutor and been teaching children and adults for over 8 years. I help my students with learning grammar, speaking practice, preparing for exams etc.
I have been working as an English teacher at a local secondary school for girls in the UAE. I have 4 classes and I teach them English.
Assisting with translation of articles for the WWF official site.

edu_info.description: Currently studying at the University of Portsmouth (England) improving my translation skills and doing research in the language field.
Mostly we were studying linguistics but also had some practice teaching languages to students at schools.

cert_info.description: It was IELTS academic and I got 7,5. It was needed to get a job as an English teacher in the UAE.
I had my internship at British council in Moscow where I volunteered in MarComms and Education units.

CELTA is a prestiogious teaching certificate that allows teachers teach online. I got this certificate in Belfast in 2017, I was studying there among native speakers and successfully finished the course.
Just some prrof of my work

course_info.trial_description: Trial lessons are 30 minutes long, and they help us get to know one another. You and I will have a quick, low-cost chat to guarantee that we work together well as a team and that your needs will be met. We can also do some exercises together so you see my style of teaching, just let me know about it in a message before our fun trial lesson. See you soon!

pro_course_detail.title: English General for EXISTING STUDENTS
pro_course_detail.description:
This class is for students who want to improve their general English skills, courses are tailored to your requirements and level, focusing on the four skills, reading, writing, speaking and listening. Mostly we are using books and worksheets but also practice conversation. This is an All-in-One option for those who want to improve all the four skills of English. 

We will go over grammar, vocabulary, spelling etc, much more than in conversation classes.

There will also be homework (if you want), more or less heavy depending on your goals and availability.

See you soon in my class!

Выбирай этот вариант урока, если хочешь прокачать все 4 навыка: говорение, произношение, письмо и слушание. Я подберу лучшие упражнения именно для тебя, и мы даже будем играть в квизы и учиться одновременно.

pro_course_detail.title: English Conversation for EXISTING STUDENTS
pro_course_detail.description:
This is a relaxed conversation style class for students who would like to practise their fluency by speaking without having to deal with the more technical aspects (grammar, spelling) of the English language. You'll get to talk freely about anything and anyone!

Этот вариант урока скорее как беседа со старой знакомой ( то есть со мной). Здесь уклон ТОЛЬКО на говорение. Мы будем обсуждать видео, тексты и просто говорить обо всем. 
Если тебе нужно подтянуть грамматику или произношение, то, пожалуйста, выбирай другой пакет уроков.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian Conversation
pro_course_detail.description:
This is a relaxed conversation style class for students who would like to practise their fluency by speaking with a native speaker. 
If you need to study GRAMMAR, please choose ANOTHER package of lessons (Russian Grammar and Conversation Classes).

Conversation is so important when you are learning a new language. If you have had a difficult time learning Russian grammar and vocabulary, you will find that simply talking regularly will greatly increase your understanding and performance in the Russian language. I enjoy talking about a diversity of subjects. I make sure that you are comfortable because I know it can be really, really difficult finding the right words sometimes. We can discuss any topic and I can tell you everything about Russians, our history and traditions. 

Увидимся! See you!

pro_course_detail.title: Russian Grammar and Conversation Classes
pro_course_detail.description: During these classes we study/revise grammatical topics and other skills like pronunciation, writing and reading. It's a more academic-style classes using books and exercises that I carefully choose for you. I always do my best to find something not that boring because studying efficiently isn't always that easy :) I know what I am talking about as I myself learnt English, French and at the moment learning Spanish, me gusta!

teacher_info.intro:
Hi, guys! I'm Tanya and I'm here to help you to improve your Russian. I've been studying English and Chinese, so I can explain materials and difficult things in three languages, don't worry about that, we'll definately find a way to communicate.
Всем привет, друзья! Меня зовут Таня и я обычная студентка, которая изучает английский и китайский языки в свободное время. Рада пообщаться с вами и помочь вам с изучением русского языка.
teacher_info.about_me:

teacher_info.about_teacher: I have experience in teaching languages, so don't worry! I'm patient and always ready to listen to you, to correct your mistakes, if you have any. I'm sure that after studying with me, you'll be like a real Russian dude (in a good way,lol). If you're humble and shy, I'll find a way to make you feel confident to share things with me, like friends do.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
We can read something and then discuss it, watch some tv series and movies, learn new vocabulary, or just talk about different things. 
Обсуждение фильмов и сериалов, новостей и тд. Работа над произношением, грамматикой.

course_info.trial_description:
During this lesson we'll get to know each other, set up your goals and just talk. 
Take a cup of tea and be ready for our class, my friend.

pro_course_detail.title: Conversation. Поболтаем? (A2+)
pro_course_detail.description:
Главная цель данного урока - помочь вам перебороть страх говорения. Я помогу вам чувствовать себя увереннее в разговоре. 
The main aim of these classes is to help you to cope with your fears, when you speak Russian. I'll help you to feel more confident, correct your mistakes.
I'll tell you how to make your speech simple and understandable for native speakers.

pro_course_detail.title: Customised lessons with other requests
Your essay, work
pro_course_detail.description:
Here you can book a lesson and I will check your writing (essays, diploma, research works).
I will provide you with detailed explanation in both languages (Russian and English).
